resources.string: Congratulations on your victory! Go to the next level?
" Congratulations! It was the last level!"
You must choose a card to strike!
Do you really want to leave?
What do you want to know?
You have health and mana points, they are worth watching. For mana points, cards are thrown onto the table. If health drops to 0, you will die!
Before you is your deck, your table, the opponent’s table and his deck.
All the action takes place on the table, cards are thrown out from the deck.
Each card has damage, health and its value. Damage is located at the bottom left, health is at the bottom right, and the cost (in mana points) is at the top right.
To throw a card on the table, click on the card from your deck and on the checkmark.
Once you have done this, it becomes inactive, it can no longer be selected until the next move.
When you press the MOVE button, the opponent comes off and your cards unfreeze. Also, if you did not notice what the enemy did, there is an information button, as you got here, there is a Move Log.
First you need to select a card from the table to go to it, now either:
1) You do not select a card from the opponent’s table and click on the Strike button - this is a button with swords, then you will hit the opponent specifically.
2) You select a card from the opponent’s table and click on the Blow button - then your card beats the opponent’s card, which will definitely answer you!
